Alerts.Title: Lakeshore East Line Maintenance
Alerts.Description: Starting Jan 22, temporary bus bridges replace train service on Lakeshore East between Pickering and Union Station during weekday peak hours for ongoing infrastructure upgrades.

Alerts.Title: Minor Delays Expected
Alerts.Description: Minor delays of up to 10 minutes expected on westbound service due to signal maintenance at Ajax.

Alerts.Title: Weekend Schedule Change
Alerts.Description: Weekend service schedule adjusted. Consult GO website for details.
